name: The Process
description:
This is a small Twine game about the process of Writing from the eyes of an unseen entity. Playable via the browser & made downloadable. Nothing special.

Reviews and opinions:

"I need a little Process again myself. I like how satisfying and routine it comes off in your thing--like there is something almost ritualistic, we all have our tricks to get into the writing headspace, and it's kinda cool how the twine tells us exactly who this guy is by how he warms up. Like I'm getting a total Kerouac/Ginsberg type hipster vibe." - @richardgoodness
